Description_lang: A tainted pylon activates and begins to channel shadowy energy into the Fallen Avatar, increasing his energy generation.The Maiden of Valor refracts the shadowy beam to all players if she stands within it, inflicting $240760s1 Shadow damage to all players every $t1 sec.If a player stands between the pylon and the Fallen Avatar the beam is redirected to them. Standing within the beam inflicts $240748s1 Shadow damage every $240746t1 sec.  In addition, the target is afflicted with Tainted Essence. This effect intensifies every $t1 sec while standing within the beam.
